metamagic.name: Durable Astral Form
metamagic.notes: Adds (Initiate Grade) to Astral Armor.

metamagic.name: Spell Blade
metamagic.notes: can use any Close Combat skill to make touch attacks for T range spells. Reach is IG/2 or 4, whichever is lower.

metamagic.name: Stealth Effect
metamagic.notes: Use a Free action and take +2 Drain to make a spell invisible to visual detection. The spell's effect is not stealthed.

metamagic.name: Peak Performance
metamagic.notes: Reroll up to (IG+1) failed dice on non-combat tests involving skills in the Athletics skill group or attribute-only tests using only physical attributes.

metamagic.name: Beckon Spirit
metamagic.notes: Permits summoning a spirit with (CHA + IG), Force up to MAG. Drain is always (Force) Physical Drain.

metamagic.name: Between the Gaps
metamagic.notes:
(-IG) to the AP of 1H Reach 0 blades with Conceal +0 or below, pistols or machine pistols in SS/SA firing mode, or garrotes.
Max AP bonus is twice Conceal.
If the target is unaware, clinched, or has been successfully hit with a garrote called shot, add (+IG/2) to attack damage.
Not compatible with spells or critter powers that would increase attack damage.

metamagic.name: Cybernetic Attunement
metamagic.notes: All implanted weapons and equipment count as Attuned.

metamagic.name: Fortitude
metamagic.notes:
Ignore IG/2 boxes of Stun/Physical damage when calcuating injury penalties.
If the Adept has Pain Resistance or High Pain Tolerance greater than their current injury penalty, they do not fall unconscious from Stun or Physical damage.
Not compatible with drugs, critter powers, Pain Editors, or Adrenaline Pumps.

metamagic.name: Instinctive Defense
metamagic.notes:
The Adept gains a pool of Defense Points equal to (5 + [MAG + IG]/2).
Defense Points can be spent instead of Initiative on a 1:1 basis for the following interrupts:
Block, Parry, Dodge, Right Back At Ya!, Riposte, and Counterstrike.

metamagic.name: Instinctive Pilot
metamagic.notes: When piloting a vehicle manually, Control Vehicle is a Free action and attacks are no longer always Complex actions.

metamagic.name: King of Beasts
metamagic.notes:
Can take a Complex action to command non-sapient critters - Animal Handling vs. critter (WIL + INT + MAG + trainer's Animal Handling).
Multiple critters use the highest defense roll, +1 for each additional critter. If successful, critters will carry out Adept's command.

metamagic.name: Magic and Machine
metamagic.notes:
Adrenaline Boost and Improved Reflexes may now stack with a single bioware/geneware/cyberware augmentation.
Improved Physical Attribute may enhance cyberlimbs (but only up to double the Enhanced STR/AGI on the limb).

metamagic.name: Martial Synergy
Medium
metamagic.notes:
The Adept gains +IG dice to resist possession and can attempt to channel any spirit which attempts to possess them.
The Adept gains 1 Service per net hit on their possession resistance roll and must resist 2 drain per hit on the spirit's possession roll.
The spirit is ejected from the Adept's body when Services are depleted or upon sunrise/sunset.
The Adept may inflict (IG) unresisted Stun/Physical damage to the spirit when the spirit is ejected.

metamagic.name: Posthuman Potential
metamagic.notes:
Choose IG/2 physical attributes to enhance.
The Adept can augment those attributes to +5/+6 with a total of +6/+9 permanent augmentation bonuses to the attribute respectively.
Permanent augmentations: ware or adept powers without a Duration.

metamagic.name: Techno-Artificer
metamagic.notes: Reduce the OR of the Telesma or an item being Attuned by (IG/2), min half.

metamagic.name: Ritual Art
metamagic.notes:
Adept may use Anchored Rituals, using lower of (IG) or Artisan instead of Ritual Spellcasting.
Adept can roll Artisan (limit [IG]) to decrease time it takes to create a temporary lodge by 10 min/hit.

metamagic.name: Sharp Tongue
metamagic.notes:
Choose an Active Skill Category and roll Intimidation vs. (WIL x 2). Bonuses against intimidation or mental manipulation apply.
Target's next action using a skill from that category suffers a dice penalty equal to net hits. Only the highest penalty from this metamagic applies.

metamagic.name: Spirit Familiar
metamagic.notes: Mundane unaugmented animal familiars and attuned animals gain Astral Form, Dual Natured, and Materialization. They may learn Assensing and Astral Combat.

metamagic.name: Swashbuckler
metamagic.notes:
+IG to Trick Shot called shots, which can be used in combat. Trick Shots don't require a Free Action to use.
Trick Shot + Intimidation can be combined into one Complex Action.
+IG/2 dice when making an attack using a called shot that does not deal damage to the target.

metamagic.name: Vehicle Ace
metamagic.notes:
Same effective bonuses as a R1 Control Rig when manually piloting a vehicle. Can be taken twice to give the bonuses of a R2 Control Rig instead.
Does not stack with Control Rig Boosters/Optimization.
